Text: Prime Brokerage Clearance Services AgreementMs Shackleton Attached is the standard SIA Form Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearance Services between First Union Securities Inc and Enron Credit Inc that we discussed If you have any questions or concerns please dont hesitate to contact me Thank you for your help Regan Grice Corporate Investment Banking Documentation Phone or Fax Enron Credit doc Enron Credit doc

RE page upper left cornerThank you Ill pass this on to our legal division for review Original Message From Shackleton Sara SMTP Sent Thursday November AM To Subject page upper left corner and such material misrepresentation could unreasonably be expected to impair your ability to perform yuor obligations hereunder Let me know if you need anything further Regards Sara Shackleton Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBa Houston TX Ph Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

First Union Securities Inc Prime Brokerage Clearance Services A greementGood morning Sara My legal contact just got back to me with her comments on your proposed changes to the standard Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearance Services Here are her comments regarding those changes she finds unacceptable Section I think many of the fees charged are prevailing market fees and not necessarily agreed to by the parties Id prefer to keep this language as is Section the representations in this agreement are fairly basic and I would therefore consider any breach of a rep as material Therefore Id prefer not to make the suggested change to clause ii Also please do not delete the language together with interest earned thereon from the date of such Event of Default at the end of this section Section paragraph a you can add the word reasonable but please do not add the word materially to this paragraph Please let me know what you think Ill work with you in every way I can to reach a consensus on the terms of the agreement Thank you Regan Grice Corporate Investment Banking Documentation Phone or Fax Original Message From Shackleton Sara SMTP Sent Thursday November AM To Subject page upper left corner and such material misrepresentation could unreasonably be expected to impair your ability to perform yuor obligations hereunder Let me know if you need anything further Regards Agreement for Prime Brokerage Clearance ServicesHi Sara I hope you had a wonderful holiday weekend During our discussion on you asked that we provide you with a prime brokerage fee schedule Im working with one of the trading assistants to find one for you but were having some difficulty If Im unable to supply you with a fee schedule is there a specific way you would like to word Paragraph Fees and Charges other than the phrase as agreed by the parties from time to time If you would like to keep your previously proposed wording I can run it by Legal one more time with an explanation of the difficulty were having Thanks so much for your patience Regan Grice Corporate Investment Banking Documentation Phone or Fax
